name: FUEL Model
description: The FUEL Model is a structured corporate coaching framework designed to improve performance, engagement, and leadership capability by following four key steps: Frame, Understand, Explore, and Lay out a plan.

discussion_purpose.title: What is the purpose of this discussion?
discussion_purpose.description: Frame the conversation by defining its purpose

desired_outcome.title: What outcome are we aiming for today?
desired_outcome.description: Set clear expectations for the session outcome

current_situation.title: What is happening now?
current_situation.description: Understand the current state and situation

success_vision.title: What does success look like for you?
success_vision.description: Explore and define what success would look like

path_options.title: What options could lead you there?
path_options.description: Explore different options and pathways to success

action_commitments.title: What actions will you commit to?

support_needed.title: What support do you need to succeed?
support_needed.description: Identify what support or resources are needed for success
